title: FierceEnergy and Smart Grid News: Finalists Announced in Third Annual Fierce Innovation Awards
text:
Technology companies recognized for innovative products and services
WASHINGTON, DC (PRWEB) October 22, 2015
The publishers of FierceEnergy and Smart Grid News today released the names of the finalists in the third annual Fierce Innovation Awards: Energy Edition.
Finalists were recognized within eighteen distinct categories under the umbrella topics of business side, transmission and distribution, end use, and technologies.
Finalists’ applications were reviewed by an exclusive panel of executives from major North American utilities including CenterPoint Energy, Duke Energy, Ameren Corporation, San Diego Gas & Electric, Iberdrola USA, Commonwealth Edison, and PECO. Full profiles of the judges can be found at https://www.fierceinnovationawards.com/energy/2015#our_judges .
All applications were evaluated based on the following criteria: technology innovation, financial impact, market validation, compatibility with existing networks, end-user customer experience, and overall level of innovation.
Winners will be announced from amongst the finalists in each category during a live webcast on Thursday, November 5 at 2PM ET. To register for the webcast, visit: https://pages.questexweb.com/EnergyAwardsReg-1073978-Nov5-2015.html?ref=PR .

About FierceMarkets
FierceMarkets, a division of Questex, LLC, is a leader in B2B e-media, providing information and marketing services in the telecommunications, life sciences, healthcare, IT, energy, government, finance, and retail industries through its portfolio of email newsletters, websites, webinars and live events. Every business day, FierceMarkets' wide array of digital publications reaches more than 2 million executives in more than 100 countries.
